title: Derailed, Ep. 6: Times Change
description: When former Gov. Tommy Thompson decided to return to politics in 2012, he was walking into a Wisconsin that was as divided as ever. The game had changed, and Thompson had to play by a new set of rules. That meant a new take on some of his old positions, including the train.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
